snippet: Bill Murray, the free-form actor who’s starring as Franklin D. Roosevelt in the coming film “Hyde Park on Hudson,” takes an interviewer on an adventure.
abstract: Interview with actor Bill Murray, who stars as Franklin D Roosevelt in Roger Michell's film  Hyde Park on Hudson, focuses on his need for a life free from preconceptions.
lead_paragraph: Bill Murray, the free-form actor who’s starring as Franklin D. Roosevelt in the coming film “Hyde Park on Hudson,” takes an interviewer on an adventure.

headline.seo: Bill Murray, Star of ‘Hyde Park on Hudson’
headline.main: With Bill Murray, Just Take the Trip
headline.print_headline: With Bill Murray, Just Take the Trip
